mapper.sql:
SELECT MTI_DPTNO, (SELECT MDI_DPTNAME FROM MF_DPT_INFO WHERE MDI_LINKNO = MTI_DPTNO) MDI_DPTNAME, MTI_TEAMNAME, TO_CHAR (DAIO_IODATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') TXT_DAIO_IODATE, TO_CHAR (DAIO_RENTEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') TXT_DAIO_RENTEDATE, DAIO_PLACE, DAIO_PRICE, FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAI_ANICODE, '1') TXT_MAI_ANICODE, MAC_NAME, MAI_ANICODE, SUBSTR(MAI_ANICODE,1, INSTR(MAI_ANICODE, '-', 1, 3)-1) MAC_ANICLSCODE, SUM (CASE WHEN (MAI_SEX IN ('1', '3')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MAI_SEX_M, SUM (CASE WHEN (MAI_SEX IN ('2', '4')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MAI_SEX_F, SUM (CASE WHEN (MAI_SEX IN ('5', '6')) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) MAI_SEX_A, COUNT (MAI_SEX) TOT_MAI_SEX FROM MF_ANI_INFO A, MF_ANI_CLS, DT_ANI_IO, MF_VVRM_INFO, MF_TEAM_INFO, MF_DPT_INFO WHERE MAI_ANICODE = DAIO_ANICODE AND MAI_VVRMNO = MVI_VVRMNO AND MAI_ANICLSCODE = MAC_ANICLSCODE AND MVI_TEAMNO = MTI_TEAMNO AND MTI_DPTNO = MDI_LINKNO AND DAIO_IOTYPE = '2' AND A.CMN_DEL_STS = 'N' AND DAIO_RESN = '8'
AND TO_DATE (#{schDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= DAIO_RENTEDATE
GROUP BY MTI_DPTNO, MTI_TEAMNAME, TO_CHAR (DAIO_IODATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR (DAIO_RENTEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAI_ANICODE, '1'), DAIO_PLACE, DAIO_PRICE, MAC_NAME, MAI_ANICODE
mapper.select: ORDER BY MTI_DPTNO, MTI_TEAMNAME, TO_CHAR (DAIO_IODATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), TO_CHAR (DAIO_RENTEDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), FN_GETANICLSNAME (MAI_ANICODE, '1')

WITH RENT_LIST AS (
) SELECT MTI_DPTNO, (SELECT MDI_DPTNAME FROM MF_DPT_INFO WHERE MDI_LINKNO = MTI_DPTNO) MDI_DPTNAME, COUNT (DISTINCT MAC_ANICLSCODE) CNT_MAI_ANICLSCODE, SUM (MAI_SEX_M) MAI_SEX_M, SUM (MAI_SEX_F) MAI_SEX_F, SUM (MAI_SEX_A) MAI_SEX_A, COUNT (TOT_MAI_SEX) TOT_MAI_SEX FROM RENT_LIST GROUP BY MTI_DPTNO ORDER BY MTI_DPTNO
